Elements.Name: IsAirDash
Description: Enables the Air Dash that lets you Drop Dash in the air by boosting whilst charging a Drop Dash.
Default Controller Guide (recommended);

- Default: A + A + A (Hold) + RT
- Drop Dash on Double Jump: A + A (Hold) + RT
Default Keyboard Guide;

- Default: Space + Space + Space (Hold) + Shift
- Drop Dash on Double Jump: Space + Space (Hold) + Shift
Default: True

Elements.Name: AirDashWorldType
Description: The areas of the game this move is allowed to be used in.
Default: Both

Elements.Name: AirDashUncurlType
Description: The behaviour of Drop Dash rolling when initiating it from the Air Dash.
Default: None

Elements.Name: AirDashInitialVelocitySV
Description: The starting velocity of the Air Dash in 2D areas.
Default: 15.0

Elements.Name: AirDashInitialVelocity
Description: The starting velocity of the Air Dash in 3D areas.
Default: 30.0

Elements.Name: IsNoAirDashCameraDelay
Description: Disables the camera delay for Drop Dash when performed via Air Dash.
Default: False

Elements.Name: IsAirTricksEnhanced
Description: Enables enhancements for Air Tricks.
Default: True

Elements.Name: AirTrickMinBoostReward
Description: The minimum amount of boost energy rewarded for performing Air Tricks.
Default: 1.0

Elements.Name: AirTrickMaxBoostReward
Description: The maximum amount of boost energy rewarded for performing Air Tricks.
Default: 5.0

Elements.Name: AirTrickSamePenalty
Description:
The amount of bonus boost energy subtracted by performing the same Air Trick multiple times.
To disable this, set this to 0.
Default: 0.5

Elements.Name: AirTrickFatigueTime
Description:
The amount of air time (in seconds) after performing at least one Air Trick before reaching fatigue for boost energy rewards, reducing the maximum boost energy reward down to minimum.
To disable this, set this to 0.
Default: 75.0

Elements.Name: IsDriftEnhancedCyberPhysics
Elements.DisplayName: Use Enhanced Physics in Cyber Space
Description: Use physics parameters that enhance movement with Drift in Cyber Space.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsDriftEnhancedIslandPhysics
Description: Use physics parameters that enhance movement with Drift on the islands.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsDropDashAirBoostCancel
Description: Allows Sonic to perform an Air Boost whilst rolling in the air.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsDropDashQuickStepCancel
Description: Allows Sonic to perform a Quick Step whilst rolling.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsDropDashStompCancel
Description: Allows Sonic to perform a Stomp Attack whilst rolling in the air.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsDropDashCancelWhenUngrounded
Description: Automatically cancels rolling when Sonic becomes ungrounded, allowing him to perform tricks.
Default: False

Elements.Name: IsNoDropDashCameraDelay
Description: Disables the camera delay for Drop Dash.
Default: False

Elements.Name: IsDropDashNoFans
Description:
Allows you to roll uninterrupted through fans without flying upwards. This is particularly useful for Air Dash.
Fans will be completely operational for all other cases except for rolling.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsDropDashSideViewRollFix
Description: Fixes Drop Dash getting stuck in 2D areas if you move the analog stick towards or away from the camera plane.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsDropDashEnhancedCyberPhysics
Elements.DisplayName: Use Enhanced Physics in Cyber Space
Description:
Use physics parameters that enhance movement with Drop Dash in Cyber Space.
These are identical to the parameters used by "Tighter Drop Dash Rotation" and will not conflict with other physics mods or codes.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsDropDashEnhancedIslandPhysics
Description:
Use physics parameters that enhance movement with Drop Dash on the islands.
These are identical to the parameters used by "Tighter Drop Dash Rotation" and will not conflict with other physics mods or codes.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsFocusDash
Description: Enables the Focus Dash that lets you charge a Spin Dash in the air and aim in any direction with slow-mo.
Default Controller Guide (recommended);

- Charge: LT + LS (in the air)
- Aim: LS
- Release: RT
Default Keyboard Guide;

- Charge: F + Z (in the air)
- Aim: W/A/S/D
- Release: Shift
Default: True

Elements.Name: FocusDashWorldType
Description: The areas of the game this move is allowed to be used in.
Default: Islands Only

Elements.Name: FocusDashInitialVelocitySV
Description: The starting velocity of the Focus Dash in 2D areas.
Default: 50.0

Elements.Name: FocusDashInitialVelocity
Description: The starting velocity of the Focus Dash in 3D areas.
Default: 75.0

Elements.Name: FocusDashCameraStickType
Description:
The analog stick used to aim Focus Dash.
This will always be on W/A/S/D for keyboard users.
Default: Left

Elements.Name: FocusDashYawSensitivity
Description:
The sensitivity of moving the camera left and right.
To invert this, set this value to a negative number.
Default: 6.5

Elements.Name: FocusDashPitchSensitivity
Description:
The sensitivity of moving the camera up and down.
To invert this, set this value to a negative number.
Default: 3.25

Elements.Name: FocusDashActiveBoostConsumption
Description:
The amount of boost energy actively subtracted whilst charging Focus Dash.
To disable this, set this to 0.
Default: 2.5

Elements.Name: FocusDashMinPitchBoostConsumption
Description:
The amount of boost energy subtracted when releasing Focus Dash at a downward angle.
To disable this, set this to 0.
Default: 5.0

Elements.Name: FocusDashMaxPitchBoostConsumption
Description:
The amount of boost energy subtracted when releasing Focus Dash at an upward angle.
To disable this, set this to 0.
Default: 50.0

Elements.Name: IsFocusDashNoBoostReplenishment
Description: Disables the boost gauge automatically replenishing when releasing Focus Dash.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsFocusDashVFX
Description: Applies a greyscale filter to the screen whilst charging Focus Dash.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsFocusDashSE
Description: Plays a slow-mo sound on loop whilst charging Focus Dash.
Default: True

Elements.Name: SlideDashActionTypeSV
Description: The behaviour for pressing the Slide button in 2D areas.
Default: Spin Move

Elements.Name: SlideDashActionType
Description: The behaviour for pressing the Slide button in 3D areas.
Default: Drop Dash

Elements.Name: IsSlideDashNoDropDashCameraDelay
Description: Disables the camera delay for Drop Dash when performed via Slide Dash.
Default: False

Elements.Name: SpinChargeCameraShakeType
Description:
The amount of camera shake when charging a Spin Dash.
The "Restore Unused Spin Charge Camera Shake" code must be disabled for this option to apply.
Default: Medium

Elements.Name: SpinChargeInitialReleaseVelocitySV
Description: The starting velocity of the Spin Dash when released in 2D areas.
Default: 5.0

Elements.Name: SpinChargeInitialReleaseVelocity
Description: The starting velocity of the Spin Dash when released in 3D areas.
Default: 10.0

Elements.Name: SpinChargeMultiplier
Description: The multiplier added for every charge of the Spin Dash.
Default: 0.25

Elements.Name: SpinChargeTerminalReleaseVelocity
Description: The velocity bonus limit from charging a Spin Dash.
Default: 100.0

Elements.Name: SpinChargeTerminalReleaseVelocity
Description: The rate at which the bonus velocity decays when the Spin Dash is released.
Default: 10.0

Elements.Name: IsSpinChargeNoAirCamera
Description: Disables the zoom camera when charging a Spin Dash in the air.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsSpinChargeNoAirDeceleration
Description:
Disables Sonic's velocity decelerating when charging a Spin Dash in the air.
This option is recommended with "Disable Spin Charge Air Camera".
Default: True

Elements.Name: SpinDashReleaseActionType
Description: The behaviour for releasing a Spin Dash.
Default: Default

Elements.Name: SpinDashSlideActionType
Description: The behaviour for pressing the Slide button to exit from a Spin Dash.
Default: Spin Charge

Elements.Name: IsSpinDashStompCancel
Description: Disregards the "Slide Action" setting when in the air and performs a Stomp Attack instead.
Default: False

Elements.Name: IsSpinDashNoDropDashCameraDelay
Description: Disables the camera delay for Drop Dash when performed via Spin Dash.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsSpinDashEnhancedCyberPhysics
Elements.DisplayName: Use Enhanced Physics in Cyber Space
Description: Use physics parameters that enhance movement with Spin Dash in Cyber Space.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsSpinDashEnhancedIslandPhysics
Description: Use physics parameters that enhance movement with Spin Dash on the islands.
Default: True

Elements.Name: SpinMoveEffectsType
Description: The behaviour of the particle effect for Spin Move.
Default: Velocity-based

Elements.Name: SpinMoveTerminalVelocityType
Description: The behaviour for reaching terminal velocity for Spin Move.
Default: 2D only

Elements.Name: IsSpinMoveAirBoostCancel
Description: Allows Sonic to perform an Air Boost whilst rolling in the air.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsSpinMoveStompCancel
Description: Allows Sonic to perform a Stomp Attack whilst rolling in the air.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsSpinMoveCancelWhenUngrounded
Description: Automatically cancels rolling when Sonic becomes ungrounded, allowing him to perform tricks.
Default: False

Elements.Name: IsSpinMoveEnhancedCyberPhysics
Elements.DisplayName: Use Enhanced Physics in Cyber Space
Description: Use physics parameters that enhance movement with Spin Move in Cyber Space.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsSpinMoveEnhancedIslandPhysics
Description: Use physics parameters that enhance movement with Spin Move on the islands.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsQuickStompDash
Description: Enables the Quick Stomp Dash that lets you Drop Dash in the air by initiating a Stomp Attack past the specified velocity threshold.
Default Controller Guide (recommended);

- Default: A + B (when moving faster than the specified velocity threshold)
- Require Air Boost: A + RT + B
Default Keyboard Guide;

- Default: Space + Ctrl (when moving faster than the specified velocity threshold)
- Require Air Boost: Space + Shift + Ctrl
Default: False

Elements.Name: QuickStompDashWorldType
Description: The areas of the game this move is allowed to be used in.
Default: Islands Only

Elements.Name: QuickStompDashUncurlType
Description: The behaviour of Drop Dash rolling when initiating it from the Quick Stomp Dash.
Default: None

Elements.Name: QuickStompDashVelocityThresholdSV
Description:
The velocity Sonic must be at to allow him to Drop Dash in the air in 2D areas.
Set this to zero to Drop Dash regardless of velocity.
Default: 15.0

Elements.Name: QuickStompDashVelocityThreshold
Description:
The velocity Sonic must be at to allow him to Drop Dash in the air in 3D areas.
Set this to zero to Drop Dash regardless of velocity.
Default: 25.0

Elements.Name: IsNoQuickStompDashCameraDelay
Description: Disables the camera delay for Drop Dash when performed via Quick Stomp Dash.
Default: False

Elements.Name: IsQuickStompDashRequireAirBoost
Description:
Require Air Boost to perform a Quick Stomp Dash.
This will ignore the velocity threshold.
Default: True
Disables camera shake.
A subtle amount of camera shake.
A moderate amount of camera shake.
This restores the unused camera.
A high amount of camera shake.
An absurd amount of camera shake.
Allows you to roll until Drop Dash runs out.
Immediately uncurls when entering the state. This is useful if you have the Air Trick skill unlocked.
This will revert to None in Cyber Space.
Uncurls when becoming grounded.
Use the left stick to aim Focus Dash.
Use the right stick to aim Focus Dash.
Disables Slide Dash.
Instantly Drop Dash by pressing the Slide button.
Begin rolling by pressing the Slide button.
Release Spin Boost for Spin Dash.
Release Drop Dash for Spin Dash.
Default.
Exits Spin Dash into running or falling.
Exits Spin Dash into sliding or falling.
This will initiate a Drop Dash when grounded if Slide Dash is enabled.
Exits Spin Dash into charging another.
Exits Spin Dash into Drop Dash.
Don't use any effects.
Toggles the Drop Dash particle when exceeding the initial velocity threshold.
Always use the Drop Dash particle.
Continue rolling when reaching terminal velocity.
Releases a Spin Dash when reaching terminal velocity in 2D areas.
Releases a Spin Dash when reaching terminal velocity in 3D areas.
Releases a Spin Dash when reaching terminal velocity.
Allow this move to function both on the islands and in Cyber Space.
Allow this move to function only in Cyber Space.
Allow this move to function only on the islands.
